content: There is software on the market for that. Thunderbird can do some of those tasks, but not all. Steps 3, 4, and 5 required special software.
creator: davidsk

content: Ciao, Devi cancellare il profilo utente prima di reinstallare come spiegato qui https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/disinstallare-thunderbird#w_rimuovere-i-dati-personali-e-le-impostazioni
